questions.text: Whose autograph did the kid in the cold opening want?
questions.explanation:
Carl Yastrzemski.

	Carl Yastrzemski was known by his fans as "Yaz". The kid asked Sam to sign the ball for a friend saying his friend wouldn't know what Yaz's handwriting looked like anyway.

questions.text: Who had a birthday in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla was played by Rhea Perlman. Carla had eight children on the show but only five as of this episode.

questions.text: What did Cliff get the birthday person?
questions.explanation:
toilet water.

	When most people think of toilet water they think of perfume. However, Cliff actually got her water from a toilet.

questions.text: What did Norm get the birthday person?
questions.explanation:
a jelly bean.

	The jelly bean was garlic flavored. Everyone was getting Carla gag gifts that year.

questions.text: What did Frasier and Diane decide to do?
questions.explanation:
cohabitate.

	When they told Sam, Sam acted like he didn't understand. So they explained to him that they were going to live together.

questions.text: What was the name of Frasier's dog?
questions.explanation:
Pavlov.

	Frasier named his dog after the scientist who made a dog drool by associating a bell with food. Frasier's favorite psychiatrist was Sigmund Freud.

questions.text: What did Diane say caused her allergy?
questions.explanation:
Frasier's dog.

	After Diane moved in with Frasier she started to get the allergies. She concluded it must have been because of Pavlov.

questions.text: What did Sam say Diane's allergy was?
questions.explanation:
Psychosomatic.

	Diane thought Sam was full of it since he was not known for his intelligence. However, he was later proven right.

questions.text: What did the gang get the birthday person to make up for all the gag gifts?
questions.explanation:
a sweater.

	Cliff picked up the sweater. It turned out it was also a gag gift that said "I'm as horny as a hoot owl" when she would sweat. They all went after Cliff for getting that gift.

questions.text: Who ended up with Frasier's dog?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Because Frasier and Diane thought Diane was allergic to Pavlov, Sam took him. When they found out that wasn't the cause of her allergies, Frasier wanted her back but Sam wouldn't return her. He'd renamed her Diane.
